title: Critérium du Dauphiné: Jonas Vingegaard crushes GC in Tour de France primer, Giulio Ciccone wins stage 8 out of break
content:
Vingegaard rides hot into Tour de France title defense with dominant overall victory in prestigious tune-up race, Ciccone scores final stage with breakaway raid.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné: Jonas Vingegaard crushes GC in Tour de France primer, Giulio Ciccone wins stage 8 out of break on Velo.
author: ahood
